# 6.0 Docs

## ASP.NET Core

- [ActionResult<T> sets StatusCode to 200](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/6.0/actionresult-statuscode.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 6.0 where ActionResult<T> always sets the status code to 200, even if it was set manually.
- [AddDataAnnotationsValidation method made obsolete](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/6.0/adddataannotationsvalidation-obsolete.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 6.0 where the AddDataAnnotationsValidation method is replaced with EnableDataAnnotationsValidation.
- [Assemblies removed from shared framework](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/6.0/assemblies-removed-from-shared-framework.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 6.0 where some assemblies where removed from the Microsoft.AspNetCore.App shared framework.
- [Blazor: Parameter name changed in RequestImageFileAsync method](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/6.0/blazor-parameter-name-changed-in-method.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 6.0 titled Blazor: Parameter name changed in RequestImageFileAsync method
- [Blazor: WebEventDescriptor.EventArgsType property replaced](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/6.0/blazor-eventargstype-property-replaced.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 6.0 where the WebEventDescriptor.EventArgsType property is replaced by the EventName property.
- [Blazor: Byte-array interop](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/6.0/byte-array-interop.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 6.0 titled Blazor: Byte Array Interop
- [ClientCertificate doesn't trigger renegotiation](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/6.0/clientcertificate-doesnt-trigger-renegotiation.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 6.0 where the ClientCertificate property no longer triggers renegotiation for HttpSys.
- [EndpointName metadata not set automatically](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/6.0/endpointname-metadata.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 6.0 where EndpointName metadata is no longer automatically set for minimal endpoints.
- [Identity: Default Bootstrap version of UI changed](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/6.0/identity-bootstrap4-to-5.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 6.0 where the default version of Bootstrap used with Identity changes from 4 to 5.
- [Kestrel: Log message attributes changed](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/6.0/kestrel-log-message-attributes-changed.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 6.0 titled Kestrel: Log message attributes changed
- [MessagePack: Library changed in @microsoft/signalr-protocol-msgpack](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/6.0/messagepack-library-change.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 6.0 where the MessagePack library was changed and two options were removed in the @microsoft/signalr-protocol-msgpack package.
- [Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Features split](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/6.0/microsoft-aspnetcore-http-features-package-split.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 6.0 where the Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Features package has been split, and no longer ships as a package.
- [Middleware: HTTPS Redirection Middleware throws exception on ambiguous HTTPS ports](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/6.0/middleware-ambiguous-https-ports-exception.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 6.0 titled Middleware: HTTPS Redirection Middleware throws exception on ambiguous HTTPS ports
- [Middleware: New Use overload](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/6.0/middleware-new-use-overload.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 6.0 where a new overload of Use middleware was introduced.
- [Minimal API renames in RC 1](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/6.0/rc1-minimal-api-renames.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 6.0 RC 1 where some minimal APIs were renamed.
- [Minimal API renames in RC 2](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/6.0/rc2-minimal-api-renames.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 6.0 RC 2 where some minimal APIs were renamed.
- [MVC doesn't buffer IAsyncEnumerable types](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/6.0/iasyncenumerable-not-buffered-by-mvc.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 6.0 where MVC no longer buffers IAsyncEnumerable return types when formatting using System.Text.Json.
- [Nullable reference type annotations changed](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/6.0/nullable-reference-type-annotations-changed.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 6.0 titled Nullable reference type annotations changed
- [Obsoleted and removed APIs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/6.0/obsolete-removed-apis.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 6.0 titled Obsoleted and removed APIs
- [PreserveCompilationContext not configured by default](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/6.0/preservecompilationcontext-not-set-by-default.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 6.0 where the PreserveCompilationContext property is no longer configured by default.
- [Razor: Compiler generates single assembly](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/6.0/razor-compiler-doesnt-produce-views-assembly.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 6.0 where the Razor compiler no longer uses a two-step compilation process to produce two separate assemblies.
- [Razor: Logging ID changes](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/6.0/razor-pages-logging-ids.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 6.0 where some Razor pages logging IDs were changed.
- [Razor: RazorEngine APIs marked obsolete](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/6.0/razor-engine-apis-obsolete.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 6.0 titled Razor: RazorEngine APIs marked obsolete
- [SignalR: Java Client updated to RxJava3](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/6.0/signalr-java-client-updated.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 6.0 where the SignalR Java Client was updated to RxJava3.
- [TryParse and BindAsync methods are validated](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/6.0/tryparse-bindasync-validation.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 6.0 where `TryParse` and `BindAsync` methods on parameter types for `Map*` methods are validated at startup.
